.xterm-rows div span, 
.formBox div p, 
blockquote, blockquote b, blockquote p, 
.sourceLine, 
#code_JUT ol li,
pre.r a, 
pre, pre span, li span, pre.rsplus, pre b, 
/*tbody tr td span,*/ 
tbody tr td, 
.line, 
.example_code, 
.container div code, 
.codeMirrors, 
.cm-variable, 
.ace_line span, .ace_line,  
.rsplus, 
.blob-code, .blob-code span, .blob-num, 
code.r, .r.plain, .r.functions, .r.string, .r.keyword, 
code.plain, code.functions, code.string, code.keyword, code.spaces, code.value,   
code span, /*stackoverflow.com*/
code span a, 
code, kbd, samp, var {
    font-family: "Dank Mono", "WenQuanYi Micro Hei", monospace !important;
    font-size:100%;
}

name: Good Twitter 2021 — ALL modes supported!

usercssData.name: Good Twitter 2021 — ALL modes supported!
usercssData.author: Thomas Culp
usercssData.description: Formerly (Good-ish Twitter) — Get a little bit of the old "good" Twitter feeling back. Combines the best parts of the old layout with the best parts of the new application. Recently added support for dark and dim modes all in one.Moved navigation to a top bar instead of left-side column, with better notification indicators in the menu, and an overall "tighter" appearance. A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up. 06-10-2021 - Various fixes and quality of life updates from Twitter changes.06-19-2020 - Fixed "new tweets" button cutoff. 04-24-2020 - Fixed the profile thumbnail drop-down menu that was added recently. Fixed the top header bar positioning. 08-21-2019 - Fixed sidebar search box positioning after the most recent update.

A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up. 06-10-2021 - Various fixes and quality of life updates from Twitter changes.06-19-2020 - Fixed "new tweets" button cutoff. 04-24-2020 - Fixed the profile thumbnail drop-down menu that was added recently. name: Old New Twitter

usercssData.name: Old New Twitter
usercssData.author: Tritium Decay
usercssData.description: This theme tries to make the new Twitter design look less different from its previous design.The top bar is brought back and colors of things are made to match the older twitter. There is support for all default colour schemes.If you like it, please leave a positive rating.Contact me on My Twitter if you wish to suggest a change.ScreenshotsDark ModeProfile BackgroundsLight ModeLights Out Mode-Basically all languages are supported
